header.name: Branden Vennes
header.summary: Experienced full-stack software engineer with 6+ years developing scalable distributed systems, streaming data platforms, and event-driven architectures. Proven track record building mission-critical systems serving millions of users across entertainment, blockchain, and construction industries. Strong expertise in schema management, real-time data processing, and both functional and object-oriented programming paradigms. AWS certified with entrepreneurial experience from working at a blockchain startup.

experience.title: Software Engineer II
experience.detail: Architected and maintained critical streaming data platform serving 50+ engineering teams across Disney+ and Hulu, processing millions of real-time events through AWS Kinesis streams with zero-downtime requirements

Built a comprehensive stream-snapshot state management system enabling teams to maintain application state from event streams, successfully integrated into Disney+ content metadata unification project processing millions of entertainment entities

Developed a robust schema registry supporting backwards-compatible evolution using AWS Smithy, ensuring safe deployments across distributed services with complex validation pipelines and semantic versioning
Implemented multi-language artifact generation pipeline supporting Scala, Java, Python, and Protobuf with automated JSON serialization using Circe, Jsoniter, and custom Python encoders
Engineered real-time data-lake integrations using Spark, Databricks, Parquet, and S3 for analytics, machine learning workflows, and executive decision-making
Designed sophisticated CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and GitHub Actions for schema validation, compatibility checking, and automated artifact deployment

experience.title: Blockchain Platform Engineer
experience.detail: Developed core runtime components for a proof-of-stake blockchain platform using Scala and Akka actors, implementing distributed consensus algorithms and peer-to-peer networking protocols for supply chain verification
Built a fault-tolerant distributed node network with TCP communication and a comprehensive HTTP management API for secure key rotation, transaction signing, and node configuration
Created a high-performance transaction streaming service using Scala http4s, Cats Effect, and MongoDB with a Protobuf API enabling real-time blockchain data querying and indexing
Designed a React user interface providing transaction monitoring and blockchain data visualization capabilities for end users

experience.title: Software Engineer I & II
experience.detail: Developed full-stack solutions for a construction project management platform serving thousands of users with complex organizational workflows for submittals, RFIs, and issue tracking
Architected a cutting-edge event-sourced change management interface with complete audit trails, storing all user interactions as immutable events with state derived from event streams
Built a sophisticated change order tracking system with financial lineage features and cross-entity referencing, integrated with the company's flagship enterprise resource management application
Implemented a microservices architecture using C# deployed on Azure cloud infrastructure with MSSQL and Event Store databases, spanning database modeling, REST APIs, and responsive web UI components

experience.title: QA Automation Engineer
experience.detail: Designed a comprehensive test automation framework enabling non-technical team members to define and execute complex test scenarios using simple C# interfaces
Built an API testing framework for microservices validation and a Selenium-based UI testing framework for headless and browser-based test execution
Conducted performance testing and load testing analysis including bulk operations to ensure system scalability and responsiveness under high concurrent user loads
Established quality assurance processes and comprehensive test case documentation for manual and automated testing procedures, reducing production defects
